text: This Week: The date range from last Sunday (inclusive) to today (inclusive)

metadata.value: The date range from last Sunday (inclusive) to today (inclusive)

text: Last Week (LWK): The date range from the Saturday of the week before last to the Sunday of last week

metadata.value: The date range from the Saturday of the week before last to the Sunday of last week

text: Week-to-Date (WTD): The date range from the first day (Sunday) of the current week to yesterday

metadata.value: The date range from the first day (Sunday) of the current week to yesterday

text: Month-to-Date (MTD): The date range from the first day of the current month to yesterday

metadata.value: The date range from the first day of the current month to yesterday

text: Quarter-to-Date (QTD): The date range from the first day of the current fiscal quarter to yesterday

metadata.value: The date range from the first day of the current fiscal quarter to yesterday

text: Year-to-Date (YTD): The date range from the first day of the current calendar year to yesterday

metadata.value: The date range from the first day of the current calendar year to yesterday

text: Calendar Year-to-Date (C-YTD): Alias for YTD (From the first day of this year to yesterday)

metadata.value: Alias for YTD (From the first day of this year to yesterday)

text: Fiscal Year-to-Date (F-YTD): The date range from the first day of the current fiscal year (April 1st) to yesterday

metadata.value: The date range from the first day of the current fiscal year (April 1st) to yesterday

text: Fiscal Year 2023 (FY23): The period from April 1, 2022, to March 31, 2023

metadata.value: The period from April 1, 2022, to March 31, 2023

text: Fiscal Year 2024 (FY24): The period from April 1, 2023, to March 31, 2024

metadata.value: The period from April 1, 2023, to March 31, 2024

text: Fiscal Year 2025 (FY25): The period from April 1, 2024, to March 31, 2025

metadata.value: The period from April 1, 2024, to March 31, 2025

text: Fiscal Year 2026 (FY26): The period from April 1, 2025, to March 31, 2026

metadata.value: The period from April 1, 2025, to March 31, 2026

text: Fiscal Year 2027 (FY27): The period from April 1, 2026, to March 31, 2027

metadata.value: The period from April 1, 2026, to March 31, 2027

text: Week ID: {'description': "A six-digit identifier in the 'yyyyww' format (e.g., '202505' for the 5th week of 2025)", 'Rule for Year Assignment': ['If the current date is between April 1st and December 31st, use the current year + 1', 'If the current date is between January 1st and March 31st, use the current year'], 'SQL': 'SELECT week_id FROM chatbi_dim_calendar WHERE date_code = CURRENT_DATE'}

value.description: A six-digit identifier in the 'yyyyww' format (e.g., '202505' for the 5th week of 2025)
Rule for Year Assignment: If the current date is between April 1st and December 31st, use the current year + 1
If the current date is between January 1st and March 31st, use the current year
value.SQL: SELECT week_id FROM chatbi_dim_calendar WHERE date_code = CURRENT_DATE

text: Country: {'China/CN/Mainland': "Refers to Mainland China. The database value is country = 'mainland'", 'HK': "Refers to Hong Kong. The database value is country = 'Hongkong'"}

value.China/CN/Mainland: Refers to Mainland China. The database value is country = 'mainland'
value.HK: Refers to Hong Kong. The database value is country = 'Hongkong'

text: Region: A geographic classification for stores. Common values include APAC (Asia-Pacific), West, East, North, and South

metadata.value: A geographic classification for stores. Common values include APAC (Asia-Pacific), West, East, North, and South

text: Channel: {'EC': 'E-commerce', 'FP': 'Distributor (Franchise Partner)', 'O&O': "Retail stores (Owned & Operated). Note: Both 'Retail' and 'O&O' refer to this channel. Always use channel = 'O&O' in queries"}

value.O&O: Retail stores (Owned & Operated). Note: Both 'Retail' and 'O&O' refer to this channel. Always use channel = 'O&O' in queries

text: Store Type: {'BH': 'Direct-operated (Brand House) store', 'FH': 'Factory store'}
Platform: (For EC channel) The name of the e-commerce store (e.g., TMALL, JD)

metadata.value: (For EC channel) The name of the e-commerce store (e.g., TMALL, JD)

text: Store Name: The specific name of a store (e.g., EC-TMALL, VIP STORE 2, UA Korea, Tiktok Store)

metadata.value: The specific name of a store (e.g., EC-TMALL, VIP STORE 2, UA Korea, Tiktok Store)

text: Store Code: A unique identifier for a store, typically structured as UABH_CHN_1234, where CHN is the country code and 1234 is a unique store number

metadata.value: A unique identifier for a store, typically structured as UABH_CHN_1234, where CHN is the country code and 1234 is a unique store number

text: Comp Flag: Indicates a comparable store that has been open for a full 12 months. These stores are flagged as comp_flag = 'Y' in the database

metadata.value: Indicates a comparable store that has been open for a full 12 months. These stores are flagged as comp_flag = 'Y' in the database

text: Customer Name: {'description': 'The name of the dealer or distributor that operates the store', 'O&O': "Uniformly 'Retail' for O&O channel stores", 'FP': 'Name of the external partner (e.g., BEIJING JSBR, YYY-HN)'}

value.description: The name of the dealer or distributor that operates the store
value.FP: Name of the external partner (e.g., BEIJING JSBR, YYY-HN)

text: Division: The high-level product category. Database values: APP (Apparel), ACC (Accessories), FTW (Footwear)

metadata.value: The high-level product category. Database values: APP (Apparel), ACC (Accessories), FTW (Footwear)

text: Gender: The target gender for the product (e.g., MENS, WOMENS, BOYS, GIRLS, Unisex)

metadata.value: The target gender for the product (e.g., MENS, WOMENS, BOYS, GIRLS, Unisex)

text: End Use: The intended sport or activity for the product (e.g., TRAINING, RUNNING, BASEBALL, GOLF, Outdoor)

metadata.value: The intended sport or activity for the product (e.g., TRAINING, RUNNING, BASEBALL, GOLF, Outdoor)

text: Silhouette: The form or shape of the product (e.g., BOTTOMS, ONE PIECES, SANDALS, Gloves)

metadata.value: The form or shape of the product (e.g., BOTTOMS, ONE PIECES, SANDALS, Gloves)

text: Fit Type: The cut or fit of the product (e.g., LOOSE, REGULAR, FITTED, ONE SIZE)

metadata.value: The cut or fit of the product (e.g., LOOSE, REGULAR, FITTED, ONE SIZE)

text: MFO: A product line attribute (e.g., Inline, MFO, Promo)

metadata.value: A product line attribute (e.g., Inline, MFO, Promo)

text: Key Stories/Category of Merchandise: A marketing or thematic attribute for the product (e.g., Curry, HOVR, Armour Print, Women's Bra & Fitted Bottoms, Fat Tire, Slipspeed)

metadata.value: A marketing or thematic attribute for the product (e.g., Curry, HOVR, Armour Print, Women's Bra & Fitted Bottoms, Fat Tire, Slipspeed)

text: Season Code: {'description': 'This field in the product/sales tables always refers to the Product Season (the season the item was designed for), not the sales season', 'SSYY': "Denotes Spring/Summer for the year 'YY'. Product season for items designed for Jan-Jun", 'FWYY': "Denotes Fall/Winter for the year 'YY'. Product season for items designed for Jul-Dec", 'In-Season vs. Off-Season': ["An item is 'in-season' if its Product Season (season_code) matches the Sales Season", "It is 'off-season' if they differ"]}

value.description: This field in the product/sales tables always refers to the Product Season (the season the item was designed for), not the sales season
value.SSYY: Denotes Spring/Summer for the year 'YY'. Product season for items designed for Jan-Jun
value.FWYY: Denotes Fall/Winter for the year 'YY'. Product season for items designed for Jul-Dec
In-Season vs. Off-Season: An item is 'in-season' if its Product Season (season_code) matches the Sales Season

text: Sales: Net Sales Amount. Calculated as total sales minus canceled and returned amounts. This is the amt field in the sales table

metadata.value: Net Sales Amount. Calculated as total sales minus canceled and returned amounts. This is the amt field in the sales table

text: Demand Sales: Represents total sales demand. Calculated as Net Sales plus the value of returned goods: amt + amt_return

metadata.value: Represents total sales demand. Calculated as Net Sales plus the value of returned goods: amt + amt_return

text: SOB: The proportion of total business, which can be based on either sales amount or sales quantity

metadata.value: The proportion of total business, which can be based on either sales amount or sales quantity

text: Ach: The achievement rate against a sales target. Formula: (Actual Sales / Target Sales)

metadata.value: The achievement rate against a sales target. Formula: (Actual Sales / Target Sales)

text: Discount: The effective discount rate given. Formula: ((Original Price - Actual Sales Amount) / Original Price)

metadata.value: The effective discount rate given. Formula: ((Original Price - Actual Sales Amount) / Original Price)
